verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Jehovah<WH3068> answer<WH6030> thee in the day<WH3117> of trouble<WH6869>; The name<WH8034> of the God<WH430> of Jacob<WH3290> set thee up on high<WH7682>;
Send <WH7971> thee help<WH5828> from the sanctuary<WH6944>, And strengthen<WH5582> thee out of Zion<WH6726>;
Remember <WH2142> all thy offerings<WH4503>, And accept<WH1878> thy burnt-sacrifice<WH5930>; <WH5542>[[Selah
Grant <WH5414> thee thy heart<WH3824>'s desire<WH4390>, And fulfil all thy counsel<WH6098>.
We will triumph<WH7442> in thy salvation<WH3444>, And in the name<WH8034> of our God<WH430> we will set up our banners<WH1713>: Jehovah<WH3068> fulfil<WH4390> all thy petitions<WH4862>.

Now know<WH3045> I that Jehovah<WH3068> saveth<WH3467> his anointed<WH4899>; He will answer<WH6030> him from his holy<WH6944> heaven<WH8064> With the saving<WH3468> strength<WH1369> of his right hand<WH3225>.
Some trust in chariots<WH7393>, and some in horses<WH5483>; But we will make mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>.
They are bowed down<WH3766> and fallen<WH5307>; But we are risen<WH6965>, and stand upright<WH5749>.
Save <WH3467>, Jehovah<WH3068>: Let the King<WH4428> answer<WH6030> us when<WH3117> we call<WH7121>.
